thread.title: Officials: Broken rail missed on 2 inspections caused fiery W.Va. oil train derailment

title: Officials: Broken rail missed on 2 inspections caused fiery W.Va. oil train derailment
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: South - Today 
Federal investigators say a broken rail that wasn't found on two previous inspections led to a fiery oil train derailment in southern West V...
